nodes.text: Blumfruit tarts were a food item that consisted of a pink, blumfruit filling held in a pastry base. In 3 ABY, the Ewok Latara was riding the stubborn bordok Baga on the Forest Moon of Endor, and she fed the creature a blumfruit tart to coax it into moving. Baga quickly ate the tart and began to sprint, ejecting Latara from her saddle.

Blumfruit tarts first appeared in "Princess Latara," the fourth episode in the second season of the animated television series Ewoks. The episode was written by Paul Dini and premiered on September 20, 1986.
